subject: Upscale any generation in FLORA
body:
View this email in your browser (https://mailchi.mp/florafauna.ai/upscale-any-generation-in-flora?e=047ceaaedc)
Logo


** Clarity, multiplied.
------------------------------------------------------------
https://x.com/florafaunaai

Introducing Image & Video Upscaling in FLORA.

Now you can multiply the resolution of any generation—2×, 3×, even 4×—and download your assets in crisp, higher fidelity.

It’s powered by Topaz Labs, and it works across all generated outputs.

While upscaling won’t affect the size of blocks inside the editor, you’ll see the difference when you export. Bigger. Sharper. Cleaner.

Perfect for final delivery, presentation-ready visuals, and high-res workflows.
Upscale your Outputs (https://www.florafauna.ai/projects)

https://www.instagram.com/florafaunaai/
https://x.com/florafaunaai?lang=en
